oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Jerry Douglas - 2008-08-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Jerry Douglas and others in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame on August 19, 2008. Band includes Luke Bulla; Todd Parks; Guthrie Trapp; Chad Melton;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jerry Douglas;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performance includes; Unfolding; The Wild Rumpus; Glide; Route Irish; A Remark You Made; The Emphysema Two Step; Marriage Made In Hollywood (with Travis Tritt); Drift Off To Dream (with Travis Tritt); Two Small Cars In Rome (with Lloyd Green); Jukebox Charlie (Lloyd Green); Intermission; Unidentified Song; Unidentified Song; Hide And Seek; The Diamond Stream (with Ed Snodderly); Pearlie Mae (Ed Snodderly); Pushed Too Far; Modern Day Bonnie And Clyde (with Travis Tritt); Unidentified Song; Unidentified Song; Band Intro; Unidentified Song; Brickbat;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Douglas, Jerry, 1956-; Tritt, Travis; Snodderly, Ed; Green, Lloyd;
